price: dhe i sjellshëm ndaj prindërve të vet, nuk ishte i ashpër dhe i padëgjueshëm.
arabic: وَبَرَّۢا بِوَٰلِدَيۡهِ وَلَمۡ يَكُن جَبَّارًا عَصِيّٗا

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: wabarran biwālidayhi walam yakun jabbāran ʿaṣiyyan
